channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voici la nouvelle GLB électrique et hybride de Mercedes : 7 places et taillée pour les départs en vacances
item.description: Mercedes-Benz dévoile le nouveau GLB, électrique et hybride. Un SUV compact familial disponible en 5 ou 7 places pour viser frontalement les amateurs de Tesla Model Y. Avec jusqu'à 631 km d'autonomie et une recharge rapide, les gros rouleurs habitués au diesel l'apprécieront.

item.title: Netflix CEO made a visit to the White House before buying Warner Bros.
item.description: In November, Ted Sarandos, Netflix’s co-CEO made a trip to the White House for a lengthy meeting with Donald Trump. According to Bloomberg, the two discussed a number of topics, but chief among them was Netflix’s plan to bid on Warner Bros. At the end of their conversation, Sardonos felt that “Netflix wouldn’t face immediate […]

item.title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 drop to $230 on Amazon
item.description:
If you haven't yet upgraded to Apple's AirPods Pro 3, you can pick up the company's latest model at a discount through a deal on Amazon right now. The AirPods Pro 3, which came out in September, are currently $20 off, bringing their price down to $230. With the new AirPods Pro, Apple made some big improvements, including better battery life and sound quality, and introduced useful new features, such as Live Translation.
The AirPods Pro 3 are the best AirPods available today, with Apple's H2 chip, and earned a score of 90 out of 100 in Engadget's review this fall. Active noise cancellation (A...

item.title: I bought a Kia EV6, my first electric car - here are 9 things I wish I'd known before buying an EV
item.description: I bought a used Kia EV6 even though I don't have charging at home. Here are the things I wish I'd known to inform my buying decision.
